Class DatesJson

java.lang.Object
br.com.conversor.challenge.alura.DatesJson
public class DatesJson extends Object
Class responsible for fetching the updated values of some currencies through an API.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Lucas Silva

  • Method Details

    • setTime

      public static void setTime(String time)
      Setter responsible for defining the date to be used in the API. Receives a String argument representing a date in the format MM-dd-yyyy.
      Parameters:
      time - The date in the format MM-dd-yyyy.

    • setMoedaApi

      public static void setMoedaApi(String moeda)
      Receives, as a parameter, the abbreviation of the currency desired by the user for conversion.
      Parameters:
      moeda - The abbreviation of the desired currency.

    • getValorMoeda

      public static String getValorMoeda()
      Responsible for obtaining the purchase value of a currency through an external API.
      Returns:
      The purchase value or null if it is not possible to obtain the value.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the HTTP call.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting for the HTTP response.
